# Java 실패코드..

```java

import java.io.*;
import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.*;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	static int[][] map;
	static int n;
	static int ans = 0;
	static int startx;
	static int starty;
	// 왼쪽 아래 오래 위
	static int[] dx = { 0, 1, 0, -1 };
	static int[] dy = { -1, 0, 1, 0 };

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

		n = sc.nextInt();
		startx = n / 2;
		starty = n / 2;
		map = new int[n][n];

//		int v = (int) (10*0.10);
//		
//		System.out.println(v);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				map[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
			}
		}

		// 초기 방향 왼쪽
		int dir = 0;
		int len = 1;
		int cnt = 0;
		while (true) {

			if (dir == 1 && len == n) {
				break;
			}
			
			if (startx == 0 && starty == 0) {
				break;
			}

			for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
				
				if (startx == 0 && starty == 0) {
					break;
				}

				startx += dx[dir] * 1;
				starty += dy[dir] * 1;

				System.out.println(startx + " " + starty + " dir is " + dir + " cnt is  " + cnt + " len is" + len);

				// 가운데 있는 모래는 0

				// dir0
				if (dir == 0) {

					 int now = map[startx][starty];
				        int s1 = (int) (now*0.01);
				        int s2 = (int) (now*0.02);
				        int s5 = (int) (now*0.05);
				        int s7 = (int) (now*0.07);
				        int s10 = (int) (now*0.1);
				        int a = now - 2*(s1+s2+s7+s10)-s5;
					
					// 2%
					if (check(startx - 2)) {
						map[startx - 2][starty] += (int) now * 0.02;

					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}

					if (check(startx + 2)) {
						map[startx + 2][starty] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}

					// 5%
					if (check(starty - 2)) {
						map[startx][starty - 2] += (int) now * 0.05;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.05;
					}

					// 10%
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty - 1)) {
						map[startx - 1][starty - 1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}

					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty - 1)) {
						map[startx + 1][starty - 1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}

					// 7%
					if (check(startx - 1)) {
						map[startx - 1][starty] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}

					if (check(startx + 1)) {
						map[startx + 1][starty] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}

					// 1%
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty + 1)) {
						map[startx - 1][starty + 1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}

					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty + 1)) {
						map[startx + 1][starty + 1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}

					// a
					
					int zz = (int) (2*(now * 0.07));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.01));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.1));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.02));
					zz+= (int) (now * 0.05);
					
					

					if (check(starty - 1)) {
						map[startx][starty - 1] += a;
					} else {
						ans += a;
					}

				}

				// dir1

				if (dir == 1) {
					// 2%
					 int now = map[startx][starty];
				        int s1 = (int) (now*0.01);
				        int s2 = (int) (now*0.02);
				        int s5 = (int) (now*0.05);
				        int s7 = (int) (now*0.07);
				        int s10 = (int) (now*0.1);
				        int a = now - 2*(s1+s2+s7+s10)-s5;

					if (check(starty - 2)) {
						map[startx][starty-2] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}

					if (check(starty + 2)) {
						map[startx][starty+2] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}
					
					//5%
					if (check(startx + 2)) {
						map[startx+2][starty] += (int) now * 0.05;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.05;
					}
					
					//10%
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty -1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					//7%
					if (check(starty + 1)) {
						map[startx][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					if (check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					//1%
					if (check(startx-1) && check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					if (check(startx-1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					
					
					// a

					int zz = (int) (2*(now * 0.07));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.01));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.1));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.02));
					zz+= (int) (now * 0.05);
					
					
					if (check(startx + 1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty] += a;
					} else {
						ans += a;
					}
					
					
				}
//				
				if(dir == 2) {
					
					// 2%
					 int now = map[startx][starty];
				        int s1 = (int) (now*0.01);
				        int s2 = (int) (now*0.02);
				        int s5 = (int) (now*0.05);
				        int s7 = (int) (now*0.07);
				        int s10 = (int) (now*0.1);
				        int a = now - 2*(s1+s2+s7+s10)-s5;

					if (check(startx + 2)) {
						map[startx+ 2][starty] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}
					
					if (check(startx - 2)) {
						map[startx-2][starty] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}
					
					//5%
					if (check(starty + 2)) {
						map[startx][starty+2] += (int) now * 0.05;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.05;
					}
					
					//10%
					
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					//1%
					
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					
					//7%
					if (check(startx + 1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					if (check(startx - 1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					// a
					

					if (check(starty + 1)) {						
						map[startx][starty + 1] += a;
					} else {
						ans += a;
					}
					
					
				}
//				
				if(dir ==3) {
					
					//2% 
					
					 int now = map[startx][starty];
				        int s1 = (int) (now*0.01);
				        int s2 = (int) (now*0.02);
				        int s5 = (int) (now*0.05);
				        int s7 = (int) (now*0.07);
				        int s10 = (int) (now*0.1);
				        int a = now - 2*(s1+s2+s7+s10)-s5;
					
					if (check(starty - 2)) {
						map[startx][starty-2] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}
					if (check(starty +2)) {
						map[startx][starty+2] += (int) now * 0.02;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.02;
					}
					
					//7% 
					if (check(starty - 1)) {
						map[startx][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					if (check(starty + 1)) {
						map[startx][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.07;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.07;
					}
					
					//5%
					
					if (check(startx -2)) {
						map[startx-2][starty] += (int) now * 0.05;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.05;
					}
					
					//10%
					
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					if (check(startx - 1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx-1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.1;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.1;
					}
					
					//1%
					
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty+1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty+1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					
					if (check(startx + 1) && check(starty-1)) {
						map[startx+1][starty-1] += (int) now * 0.01;
					} else {
						ans += (int) now * 0.01;
					}
					
					// a
					
					int zz = (int) (2*(now * 0.07));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.01));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.1));
					zz+= (int) (2*(now * 0.02));
					zz+= (int) (now * 0.05);
					
//					 int now = now;
//				        int s1 = (int) (now*0.01);
//				        int s2 = (int) (now*0.02);
//				        int s5 = (int) (now*0.05);
//				        int s7 = (int) (now*0.07);
//				        int s10 = (int) (now*0.1);
//				        int a = now - 2*(s1+s2+s7+s10)-s5;

					if (check(startx -1)) {						
						map[startx-1][starty] += a;
					} else {
						ans += a;
					}
					
				}

				// 마지막 모래값이 0

				map[startx][starty] = 0;

				for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
					for (int j2 = 0; j2 < n; j2++) {
						System.out.print(map[j][j2] + " ");
					}
					System.out.println();
				}

				System.out.println("------ ans is " + ans);

//				return;

				if (startx == 0 && starty == 0) {
					break;
				}

			}

			dir++;
			cnt++;

			if (dir == 4) {
				dir = 0;
			}

			if (cnt == 2) {
				len++;
				cnt = 0;
			}

		}

		System.out.println("ans is " + ans);

	}

	private static boolean check(int i) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if (i < 0 || i >= n) {
			return false;
		} else {
			return true;
		}

	}

}


```
